goals.baseline_prompt: Student shows inconsistent retrieval of core math facts during class tasks.
goals.goal_template_smart: Within 6 weeks, the student will increase accurate fact retrieval to 85% on weekly fluency probes.

goals.baseline_prompt: Student attempts problems without a consistent strategy.
goals.goal_template_smart: Within 8 weeks, the student will apply a named strategy and explain steps on 4/5 monitored problems.
